summary: El Salvador is a country in Central America, bordered by Honduras, Guatemala, and the Pacific Ocean. Its capital is San Salvador, and it has a population of about 6.5 million. Historically, it was ruled by Mesoamerican civilizations like the Mayans and Cuzcatlecs. The Spanish conquered it in the 16th century, and it gained independence in 1821. El Salvador experienced political turmoil and a civil war (1979-1992) due to inequality. After the war, many Salvadorans moved to the U.S. The economy, once reliant on agriculture, has diversified, and the country now uses the U.S. dollar.
title: El Salvador
